description.p: Bring joy and chaos to your table this Winterfest season, with sleigh chases, pudding gremlin fights and toy factory break-ins. This festive collection is bursting with ready-to-play one-shots, battle maps, playable species, magic items, and more for merry misadventures. Each one-shot is perfect for dropping into your campaign, or running as a special holiday game night!

ul.li: 5 holiday adventures (for levels 1–12), each playable in three hours
5 detailed maps, including a toy factory, ice castle, banquet hall and more
3 festive-themed monsters ready to battle your party
4 wintry playable species, from the Snowborn to the reindeer-like Tarandus
12 magic items based on the Twelve Days of Christmas
